member.summary: Method to create pop-up notification dialogs.
member.param: The internal name of the dialog window spawned.
The title text of the dialog window (string).
The color of the message text.
The message text of the dialog window (string).
The color of the message text.

member.name: M:RSSVE.Notification.Logger(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method to print generic text in the KSP debug log.
member.param: Name of the assembly (to be used as a log tag) (string).
The type of the log. Can be one one of the following: null (for the basic "Log" type), Warning or Error (string).

member.name: T:RSSVE.Utilities
member.summary: Class to setup basic system and utility functions.

member.name: M:RSSVE.Utilities.GetCelestialBodyList
member.summary: Method to get the available celestial body names.
member.returns: Returns a list of names for all celestial bodies found in the GameDatabase (string).

member.name: P:RSSVE.Utilities.GetGraphicsRenderer
member.summary: Method to get the operating system graphics renderer.
member.returns: Returns one of the following renderer types: D3D9, D3D11, OpenGL or Unknown (string).

member.name: P:RSSVE.Utilities.GetPlatformType
member.summary: Method to get the operating system type.
member.returns: Returns one the following operating system types: Linux, OSX, Windows or Unknown (string).

member.name: P:RSSVE.Utilities.Is64BitOS
member.summary: Method to get the operating system octet size.
member.returns: Returns True if the Operating System is using the AMD64 specification (x64) and False if it is using the baseline Intel specification (x86).

member.name: P:RSSVE.Utilities.IsVerboseDebugEnabled
member.summary: Method to check if the verbose debug option is active.
member.returns: Returns the status of the verbose debug option (boolean).
